title: Brand Ambassador
snippet:
We are hiring one or two people for the position of Brand Ambassador.  We are first hiring for one single, one-time event.  If things go well, there will be plenty of opportunities for future work.

The event is an Election Night party in Beverly Hills, California, this November 8, between 4pm and 8pm.  We are expecting between 150-200 people.  The BA's task will be to mingle with the crowd, engage people socially, and collect feedback.  It will be a really fun event!

The BA must be high-energy, very social, outgoing, approachable, and relatable.
